What is requirements.txt file ?

requirements.txt file contains the python packages names that required to run the project . requirements.txt file is located in root directory of project. example : — alembic==1.6.5 appdirs==1.4.4 arrow==1.1.1 asgiref==3.4.1 —

How to generate requirements.txt file ?

pip freeze command gives complete list of every package installed on your computer along with version numbers. There two ways to put this complete list of packages into requirements.txt file and as follows : 1. Copy pip freeze command output to requirements.txt file 2. Modify the pip freeze command as “pip freeze > requirements.txt “ so that output of command “pip freeze” stores into requirements.txt file.
